column5: I was looking at New Trucks and saw that after rebate New 2015 trucks for $70,000...add tax and $75,000. I also saw that they offered financing for 20yrs!
That's insane. I'll take my $10k used Suburban 2500 any day of the week .... thing pulls like a mule and nothing ever goes wrong with it.

I'd be curious to know how many of these $75K trucks and SUV's are actually purchased as "business" expenses. A good friend of mine with a small hobby-farm in MI had not 1 but TWO Lincoln Navigators as farm vehicles,,,,,,,, Such an abuse of the tax laws. HRG
I wonder how many are leased, maybe more than you think!
